project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: This project involves creating a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file. It will calculate and display the mean, median, and mode for the numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement calculation of mean for specified numerical columns
Implement calculation of median for specified numerical columns
Implement calculation of mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for each of the above analytical functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
